project.name: Noesis Phase 11 - Enhanced Telemetry
assumptions: Phase 10 (Prana Stream) is complete with SQLite + FIFO hybrid architecture
Rich library is available for TUI enhancements
Selemene Engine API is accessible for moon phase data
risks: Selemene API rate limits may affect moon phase sync frequency
Clifford Clock timezone handling across global deployments
Engine state tracking may require significant SQLite schema changes
Polarity tracking (Aletheios/Pichet) metrics are subjective and need calibration

phases.name: Enhanced Telemetry - Antahkarana Protocol
phases.objective: Implement remaining telemetry features from architecture specs: Clifford Clock, Engine States, Ritual Tracking, Polarity Balance, and Thought Process emissions.

tasks.title: Add Clifford Clock schema to SQLite
tasks.deliverable: New `clifford_state` table with hour, phase, and octave tracking
tasks.acceptance: Schema migrations run without errors, table stores 0-7 hour position

tasks.title: Implement `get_clifford_hour()` function
tasks.deliverable: Function that calculates current position in 8-hour consciousness octave
tasks.acceptance: Returns hour (0-7), phase (ascent/plateau/dissolution), and UTC timestamp

tasks.title: Add `noesis clock` CLI command
tasks.deliverable: CLI command showing current Clifford hour with ASCII visualization
tasks.acceptance: `noesis clock` displays hour, phase, and next transition time

tasks.title: Integrate Clifford hour into telemetry events
tasks.deliverable: All emitted events include `clifford_hour` field
tasks.acceptance: PranaEvent dataclass includes clifford_hour, events show in query output

tasks.title: Add Selemene moon phase integration
tasks.deliverable: Function to fetch current moon phase from Selemene Engine #5
tasks.acceptance: `get_moon_phase()` returns phase name, illumination %, and next phase date

tasks.title: Add `noesis moon` CLI command
tasks.deliverable: CLI command showing current moon phase with emoji
tasks.acceptance: `noesis moon` displays phase, illumination, and guna influence

tasks.title: Update TUI header with Clifford Clock
tasks.deliverable: TUI header shows Clifford hour and moon phase indicators
tasks.acceptance: Watch command displays live clock position and moon emoji

tasks.title: Add engine_states table to SQLite schema
tasks.deliverable: Table tracking 13 engines with active status, load, and last_active timestamp
tasks.acceptance: Schema matches SCHEMA_DEF.ts engine_states definition

tasks.title: Create Engine enum and metadata
tasks.deliverable: Python enum for 13 engines with name, kosha mapping, and color
tasks.acceptance: Engine metadata matches SELEMENE-ENGINE.md definitions

tasks.title: Implement `emit_engine_state()` function
tasks.deliverable: Emitter function for engine activation and load changes
tasks.acceptance: Events captured with engine_number, load (0-100), and active status

tasks.title: Add `noesis engines` CLI command
tasks.deliverable: CLI command showing all 13 engine states with load bars
tasks.acceptance: `noesis engines` displays table with name, load %, active status, last_active

tasks.title: Add engine panel to TUI dashboard
tasks.deliverable: Sidebar panel showing 13 engine states with color-coded load
tasks.acceptance: TUI watch shows engine loads updating in real-time

tasks.title: Auto-detect engine usage from event types
tasks.deliverable: Logic to infer active engines from telemetry event patterns
tasks.acceptance: Read events activate Engine #3 (Chitta), exec events activate Engine #1 (Personal OS)

tasks.title: Add rituals table to SQLite schema
tasks.deliverable: Table for cron jobs with status, vayu mapping, and last_run
tasks.acceptance: Schema matches SCHEMA_DEF.ts rituals definition

tasks.title: Create Vayu enum (Prana, Apana, Samana, Udana, Vyana)
tasks.deliverable: Enum mapping cron job types to Vayu categories
tasks.acceptance: Enum includes descriptions and recommended timing

tasks.title: Implement `emit_ritual()` function
tasks.deliverable: Emitter for ritual/cron job execution events
tasks.acceptance: Events include job_id, name, status, vayu, and duration

tasks.title: Add `noesis rituals` CLI command
tasks.deliverable: CLI command listing all rituals with status and next run
tasks.acceptance: `noesis rituals list` shows table with vayu, schedule, last_run, status

tasks.title: Add polarity tracking to session_metrics
tasks.deliverable: Fields for Aletheios/Pichet percentage balance
tasks.acceptance: Schema stores aletheios_pct and pichet_pct (sum = 100)

tasks.title: Implement `emit_polarity()` function
tasks.deliverable: Emitter for polarity balance changes
tasks.acceptance: Events track Aletheios (coherence) vs Pichet (vitality) shifts

tasks.title: Add `noesis polarity` CLI command
tasks.deliverable: CLI showing current Aletheios/Pichet balance with gauge
tasks.acceptance: `noesis polarity` displays balance bar and recent shifts

tasks.title: Add polarity indicator to TUI
tasks.deliverable: TUI gauge showing Aletheios â† â†’ Pichet balance
tasks.acceptance: Watch command shows live polarity with color gradient

tasks.title: Implement `emit_thought_process()` for long reasoning
tasks.deliverable: Emitter for thinking pulses when reasoning > 5 seconds
tasks.acceptance: Events include summary, depth_level, and duration_ms

tasks.title: Add thinking indicator to TUI stream
tasks.deliverable: Animated ðŸ§  indicator with breathing glow during long thinks
tasks.acceptance: TUI shows pulsing indicator when thought_process events arrive

tasks.title: Enhance Vikara detection with protocol checks
tasks.deliverable: Auto-detect Moha (3 failures), Mada (destructive), Kama (>100k tokens)
tasks.acceptance: Vikara events auto-emit when thresholds exceeded

tasks.title: Add Vikara jitter effect to TUI
tasks.deliverable: Visual glitch/shake effect when KhalorÄ“Ä“ < 50 or Vikara detected
tasks.acceptance: TUI elements show subtle jitter during drift states

tasks.title: Implement KhalorÄ“Ä“ scoring rules from protocol
tasks.deliverable: Auto-apply scoring: Heavy Synthesis -5, Archive +10, Protocol +2
tasks.acceptance: KhalorÄ“Ä“ balance updates automatically based on event types

tasks.title: Add `noesis status` unified dashboard command
tasks.deliverable: Single command showing clock, engines, polarity, khalorÄ“Ä“, and guna
tasks.acceptance: `noesis status` provides comprehensive system state snapshot

tasks.title: Create integration tests for all new emitters
tasks.deliverable: Test suite covering all Phase 11 emitter functions
tasks.acceptance: pytest suite passes with >80% coverage on telemetry module

tasks.title: Add end-to-end TUI test scenarios
tasks.deliverable: E2E tests for TUI dashboard components
tasks.acceptance: Tests verify all panels render and update correctly

tasks.title: Write TELEMETRY.md documentation
tasks.deliverable: Comprehensive telemetry documentation with examples
tasks.acceptance: Doc covers all CLI commands, event types, and TUI features

tasks.title: Update README with Phase 11 features
tasks.deliverable: README section for enhanced telemetry capabilities
tasks.acceptance: README includes quickstart for new commands

tasks.title: Create ASCII art diagram of full telemetry architecture
tasks.deliverable: Visual diagram showing all telemetry components
tasks.acceptance: Diagram included in docs/diagrams/TELEMETRY-ARCHITECTURE.md

tasks.title: Performance benchmark telemetry overhead
tasks.deliverable: Benchmark report on emit() latency and SQLite write performance
tasks.acceptance: Emit latency < 10ms, SQLite writes < 50ms at 1000 events/min

tasks.title: Final integration and release
tasks.deliverable: Version bump to 0.2.0, tagged release, GitHub push
tasks.acceptance: `pip install noesis` installs with all Phase 11 features
